sent.orig: The the latter engenders reality and the latter is the function of the former.
sent.trans: 道之体是道之德赖以产生的实体，道之德是道之体的功能、作用。

sent.orig: They waver while the latter stand firm, they equivocate while the latter are forthright.
sent.trans: 前者动摇，后者坚定，前者暧昧，后者明朗。

sent.orig: On this latter point he felt almost certain, knowing her freedom from levity of character.
sent.trans: 这后一点他简直确信不疑，因为他了解她的性格绝不是轻浮的。

sent.orig: Canada and the United States are in North America; the former lies north of the latter.
sent.trans: 加拿大兴美国均在北美；前者位于后者以北。

sent.orig: The former point is self-evident, while the latter has been demonstrated by the recent financial collapse.
sent.trans: 前一点不言自明，而最近发生的金融崩溃则为后者提供了证明。
